name: Doge Adventures: Escape from the Crypt O'Currency
name_original: Doge Adventures: Escape from the Crypt O'Currency
description:
Made in one week for the Dogecoin Game Jam

#DoOnlyGoodEveryday

Credits

@lopar - Code, gameplay, levels, character art, cutscenes/animation, sound effects
Dogecoin wallet: D8PjuBLccnYbvYxYieREra4xy3gx1ByhrM

@baxterong - Map tiles and environment art

@vU_Vu - Background music

Created using the Godot Engine

Fonts

  • Fibberish by Nathan Scott
  • Rise - Chevy Ray's Pixel Fonts

Check out lopar's gamedev stream at https://twitch.tv/LoparPanda
